2.name: Export
2.desc: Transport equipment to be exported on a marine vessel.

3.name: Import
3.desc: Transport equipment to be imported on a marine vessel.

4.name: Remain on board
4.desc: Transport equipment arriving on a marine vessel is to remain on board.

5.name: Shifter
5.desc: Transport equipment is to be shifted from one stowage location on a marine vessel to another on the same vessel.

6.name: Transhipment
6.desc: Transport equipment is to be transferred from one marine vessel to another.
